pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, April 8, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, April 8, 2018:

Humboldt, Saskatchewan

7 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a vigil to pay his respects and mourn the loss of the players and officials of the Humboldt Broncos.

Elgar Petersen Arena
619 17th Street, Humboldt

Note for media:

  • Closed to media
